titleInfo.title: Old Blue in a scene from "Wild River"

mods.abstract: Black and white studio photograph shows an elderly African American man talking to an older gray-haired white woman. The man, in overalls, holds a hound on a leash. The two stand in front of a movie-set shack. Three black farm hands are seen in background. Children play in foreground.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. titleInfo.title: RG 82, Tennessee Department of of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1936
